name: Crown of Watatsumi
description:
For every 3 HP of healing your characters receive, this card accumulates 1 Sea-Dyed Foam. (Maximum of 2, Current healing received: {GCG_TOKEN_SHIELD})
When this character deals DMG: Consume all Sea-Dyed Foam. DMG is increased by 1 for each one consumed.
descriptionraw: For every 3 HP of healing your characters receive, this card accumulates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Sea-Dyed Foam</color>. (Maximum of 2, <color=#D3BC8EFF>Current healing received: ${[GCG_TOKEN_SHIELD]}</color>)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When this character deals DMG:</color> Consume all <color=#FFFFFFFF>Sea-Dyed Foam</color>. DMG is increased by 1 for each one consumed.
